Creating a Makefile

a3_makefile.Rmd

Introduction 

.
├── data
│   └── swiss.csv
├── out
├── report.qmd
└── src
    ├── fig_fitted.R
    ├── model.R
    ├── scaled.R
    ├── tab_coef.R
    ├── tab_fitted.R
    └── vals_fitted.R


suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(MASS)
  library(command)
})

cmd_assign(.scaled = "out/scaled.rds",
           method = "M",
           .out = "out/model.rds")

scaled <- readRDS(.scaled)

model <- rlm(fertility ~ agriculture + infant_mort, 
             data = scaled,
             method = method)

saveRDS(model, file = .out)
cmd_make("src/model.R")
out/model.rds: src/model.R \
  out/scaled.rds
    Rscript $^ $@ --method=M
cmd_make("src/fig_fitted.R")
out/fig_fitted.png: src/fig_fitted.R \
  out/vals_fitted.rds
    Rscript $^ $@

We call 

makefile("src")
.
├── Makefile
├── data
│   └── swiss.csv
├── out
├── report.qmd
└── src
    ├── fig_fitted.R
    ├── model.R
    ├── scaled.R
    ├── tab_coef.R
    ├── tab_fitted.R
    └── vals_fitted.R


.PHONY: all
all:


out/fig_fitted.png: src/fig_fitted.R \
  out/vals_fitted.rds
    Rscript $^ $@

out/model.rds: src/model.R \
  out/scaled.rds
    Rscript $^ $@ --method=M

out/scaled.rds: src/scaled.R \
  data/swiss.csv
    Rscript $^ $@

out/tab_coef.rds: src/tab_coef.R \
  out/model.rds
    Rscript $^ $@

out/tab_fitted.csv: src/tab_fitted.R \
  out/vals_fitted.rds
    Rscript $^ $@ --digits=2

out/vals_fitted.rds: src/vals_fitted.R \
  out/scaled.rds \
  out/model.rds
    Rscript $^ $@


.PHONY: clean
clean:
    rm -rf out
    mkdir out
.
├── Makefile
├── data
│   └── swiss.csv
├── out
├── report.qmd
└── src
    ├── fig_fitted.R
    ├── model.R
    ├── scaled.R
    ├── tab_coef.R
    ├── tab_fitted.R
    └── vals_fitted.R
